analysis.description:

BitexTokenCrowdSale.claimRefund (/unique_contracts/0x0beab0ffa882bf49a2cc49b2e5aabfeb51f70082.sol#919-934) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(tokenBalance == 0)
